verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: Woe to every slanderer and backbiter.
He who gathers wealth and counts it over.
Thinking that his wealth will eternalize him.
No indeed! He will be thrust into the Crusher.
And what will make you understand what the Crusher is?
It is the kindled fire of God.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: It is the kindled fire of Allah.

verses.verseString: Which leaps up over the hearts.
It will be shut upon them.
